Entries.Description: Fix a source of "Unknown error converting pem to ppk file" issues when making SSH connections to EC2 instances

An upcoming release of the AWS Toolkit for Visual Studio 2022 will require a minimum Visual Studio version of 17.7. An info bar has been added to the Toolkit as a reminder - see https://github.com/aws/aws-toolkit-visual-studio/issues/375 for details.
Added support for Lambda Custom Runtime AL2023 deployment.

Publish to AWS has been updated to use v1.16.7 of the AWS .NET deploy tool. This version of the Toolkit includes the following Deploy Tool changes:
  - Add .NET8 support for Beanstalk web apps and ECS Fargate console apps
  - Add support for .NET8 container-based web apps
  - Add support for NodeJS 18 in generated dockerfiles
  - Improves on some error messaging
  - Uses an updated CDK bootstrap template
  - See https://github.com/aws/aws-dotnet-deploy/releases/tag/1.12.3, https://github.com/aws/aws-dotnet-deploy/releases/tag/1.13.4, https://github.com/aws/aws-dotnet-deploy/releases/tag/1.14.6, https://github.com/aws/aws-dotnet-deploy/releases/tag/1.15.7 and https://github.com/aws/aws-dotnet-deploy/releases/tag/1.16.7 for more details.
Added support for deploying Custom Runtime AL2 functions with Arm64 architecture to AWS Lambda.
